item.title: Evan Rachel Wood - All Is Found (From "Frozen 2")
item.description:
Where the north wind
meets the sea
There’s a river
full of memory
Sleep my darling
safe and sound
For in this river
all is found
In her waters
deep and true
Lie the answers
and a path for you
Dive down deep
into her sound
But not too far
or you’ll be drowned
Yes she will sing
to those who’ll hear
And in her song
all magic flows
But can you brave
what you most fear
Can you face
what the river knows
Where the north wind
meets the sea
There’s a mother
full of memory
Come my darling
homeward bound
When all is lost
then all is found
